Summary: Bright orange object heading North slow speed turned West
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There was one other sighting in Omaha on or around July 6th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsOutside my home in the front yard. Looked up in the sky and seen bright orange round shape object. Live near a airport about 3 miles away house is on the glide path of planes, watched them for years this object was no plane. It made absolutely no noise at all. It was not fireworks. It went straight North and then turned to the West and disappeared. It was amazing I never seen any craft of any kind that was solid bright orange and round shaped it just glowed in the night sky. It was awesome!!
